* Broadcom BlueSleep Mode Driver
Control Sleep-Mode Protocol on Broadcom Bluetooth devices

Required properties:
       - compatible: Should be set to one of the following:
               brcm,bluesleep
       - brcm,bt-host-wake-gpio: hostwake gpio
       - brcm,bt-wake-gpio: btwake gpio

Example:
       bt_bluesleep {
               compatible = "brcm,bluesleep";
               brcm,bt-wake-gpio = <&tlmm 30 0>;
               brcm,bt-host-wake-gpio = <&tlmm 31 0>;
               pinctrl-names = "default";
               pinctrl-0 = <&brcm_bt_wake_default &brcm_bt_hostwake_default>;
               status = "ok";
       };
